verses.verse: <S%G1161>But<s%> on the <S%G1520>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> at <S%G901>early<s%> <S%G3722>dawn,<s%> they and some others <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G3418>tomb,<s%> <S%G5342>bringing<s%> the <S%G759>spices<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they had <S%G2090>prepared.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G1096>Becoming<s%> <S%G1719>terrified,<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2532><s%> bowed their <S%G4383>faces<s%> <S%G2827>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%> They <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> do <S%G2212>you<s%> seek the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G3326>among<s%> the <S%G3498>dead?<s%>

<S%G3754>saying<s%> that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G268>sinful<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G4717>crucified,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> rise <S%G450>again?<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb,<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> to the <S%G1733>eleven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3062>rest.<s%>

Now <S%G3739>they<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2489>Joanna,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the mother of <S%G2385>James.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3062>other<s%> women <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3004>told<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G652>apostles.<s%>

But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> got <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5143>ran<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb.<s%> <S%G3879>Stooping<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> looking <S%G991>in,<s%> he saw the strips of <S%G3608>linen<s%> <S%G2749>lying<s%> by <S%G3441>themselves,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G565>departed<s%> to his <S%G2296>home,<s%> wondering <S%G4314><s%> <S%G1438><s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> had <S%G1096>happened.<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> when they <S%G3361>didn't<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> saying <S%G3004>that<s%> they <S%G3708>had<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> a <S%G3701>vision<s%> of <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G2198>alive.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> drew <S%G1448>near<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G2968>village,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> they were <S%G4198>going,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G4364>acted<s%> like he would <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G4208>further.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G3849>urged<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3306>"Stay<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4314>almost<s%> <S%G2073>evening,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> is almost <S%G2827>over.<s%>" <S%G2532>He<s%> went <S%G1525>in<s%> to <S%G3306>stay<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G2532>It<s%> <S%G1722>happened,<s%> that when <S%G846>he<s%> had sat down at the <S%G2625>table<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G740>bread<s%> and gave <S%G2127>thanks.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2806>Breaking<s%> <S%G1929>it,<s%> he gave to <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> one <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3780>"Weren't<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G2545>burning<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G2254>us,<s%> <S%G5613>while<s%> he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1722>along<s%> the <S%G3598>way,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5613>while<s%> he <S%G1272>opened<s%> the <S%G1124>Scriptures<s%> to <S%G2254>us?<s%>"

<S%G2532>They<s%> rose <S%G450>up<s%> that <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> gathered <S%G4867>together,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those who <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>They<s%> <S%G1834>related<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> that happened <S%G1722>along<s%> the <S%G3598>way,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> he was <S%G1097>recognized<s%> by <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2800>breaking<s%> of the <S%G740>bread.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> they were <S%G4422>terrified<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>filled<s%> with <S%G1719>fear,<s%> and supposed <S%G1380>that<s%> they had <S%G2334>seen<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G3056>is<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G2980>told<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> while I <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G2532>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5568>psalms,<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> must <S%G1163>be<s%> <S%G4137>fulfilled.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G3754>them,<s%> <S%G3779>"Thus<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%> it was <S%G1163>necessary<s%> for the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G649>send<s%> forth the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2523>wait<s%> <S%G5210><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> are <S%G1746>clothed<s%> with <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> on <S%G5311>high.<s%>"
